content: Rayden is a neutral good character, meaning that he is primarily motivated by his desire to do what is good and right. He believes in fairness and justice, and he is willing to take risks and make sacrifices to help those in need. He is also a strong believer in personal freedom and the rights of individuals, and he will not hesitate to challenge authority if he feels that it is being abused. Despite his noble upbringing, Rayden is not swayed by wealth or power, and he values honesty and integrity above all else.
